org.csapi.csplugin.views
Class ShowReportView

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.ui.part.WorkbenchPart
      org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart
          org.csapi.csplugin.views.ShowReportView
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension, org.eclipse.ui.IPersistable, org.eclipse.ui.IViewPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart2, org.eclipse.ui.part.IWorkbenchPartOrientation
public class ShowReportView
extends org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart

The view displaying the content of a report. It is composed of a TableViewer, which displays data a record per line. All chosen attributes are displayed in columns.

Author:
Boris Baldassari

createPartControl

public void createPartControl(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent)
Creates the UI. For our purpose, just creates a TableViewer, and link it to a LabelProvider and a ContentProvider. A dropdown menu is added also, for operations on the list. (non-Javadoc)

See Also:
WorkbenchPart.createPartControl(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite)
